name: MINI-GAMES MADNESS VOLUME: #1 - HELLO WORLD!
description:
The 4 included mini-games:

  • Eels and Ladders: A 2-player board game (also with a single player mode).
  • Cave Run - The Lost Gems Edition: An endless run and jump game where your goal is to collect as many gems as possible before you perish. The game gets more difficult the longer you survive.
  • Copter: A highly addictive arcade game.
  • Mini-Farmer: Manage and grow your own organic farm.
